document_data.name: Halls of Life and Death
document_data.mainbody: The '''Halls of Life and Death''' were storage rooms for religious items found within the [[Horseshoe Temple Oasis]] in the [[Quoya Desert]] of the [[Hordelands]] during the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The Halls were located in the upper galleries level of the temple. They were connected to both the [[Hall of the Water Buffalo]] and the [[Cave of Tranquil Peace]]. Two chambers were found within. The smaller measured {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} long by {{SI|25|ft|long=yes}} wide, while the larger measured {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} long by {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} wide.
document_data.History: The chambers within the Hall were used to store religious artifacts such as ceremonial masks and other priestly garbs used on holy days.
document_data.Inhabitants: An [[oni]] lived within the Halls of Life or Death as of the {{YearlinkName|1358}}.
